text: Chikakhala chipupa chija, eni ake adali ana awiri a masiye amene amakhala mu mzinda uja ndipo pansi pa chipupacho padali chuma chawo. Ndipo bambo wawo adali munthu wabwino motero Ambuye wako adafuna kuti anawo akule kuti adzatulutse okha chuma chawo ngati chifundo chochokera kwa Ambuye wako. Ine sindidachite zimenezi mwachifuniro changa ayi. Limeneli ndilo tanthauzo lake la zinthu zimene umalephera kupirira nazo
